Posts.Content: Hello everyoneIm new to the board..I was diagnosed with breast cancer..confirmed on March 20. They told me it was DCIS which I felt positive aboutbut then the surgeon said it was 6cm and that although the test showed DCIS..he was treating it like invasive cancer. That was okay, Id rather be safe than sorry. BUT now I am worrying about every little thingwhen I cough I think lung cancer.my shoulder hurts..I think bone cancer.is this normal ? Im definitely not a hypochondriacat least I never was. Im a healthy and active 48 year old. But Im starting to get freaked out.
Posts.Title: Starting to get worried and freaked out
